Clothing Lokal Jangan Lelah Dongkrak Kualitas Produk
01 Nov 2019, 14:46 by Ai Rika Rachmawati
BANDUNG, (PR).- Produk clothing lokal berpotensi menjadi tuan rumah di pasar generasi muda Indonesia. Hanya saja, sebagian produk lokal masih harus meningkatkan kualitas untuk bisa bersaing dengan produk impor yang sudah memiliki nama besar.
Demikian diungkapkan Chief Executive Officer (CEO) Nirwana Textille Group, Alex Ferdian Santoso, di Bandung, Rabu, 29 Oktober 2019. Menurut dia, dengan dukungan teknologi informasi (TI), produk clothing lokal juga berpotensi menembus pasar ekspor.
"Kami sudah tiga tahun mensupport clothing lokal. Bukan hanya bahan baku, kami juga membantu pembiayaan dengan menggandeng fintech," kata Alex.
Selain clothing lokal, perusahaannya juga menjadi pemasok bahan baku brand clothing internasional. Berdasarkan pengamatannya, ada beberapa produk clothing lokal yang masih kurang dari sisi kualitas.
"Ada beberapa produk clothing lokal yang kualitasnya lebih rendah dari brand internasional ternama. Ini harus diperbaiki, kita harus mengejar kualitas mereka," ujarnya.
Dari sisi kuantitas, menurut dia, setiap tahunnya bermunculan puluhan brand clothing lokal dengan berbagai ciri khasnya. Dari sisi antusiasme dalam membangun brand baru, ia mengaku mengacungi jempol.
"PR-nya tinggal berlomba-lomba meningkatkan kualitas agar sejajar dengan brand internasional ternama. Clothing lokal jangab lelah untuk meningkatkan kualitas produk untuk menggapai pasar yang lebih luas," katanya.
Dengan demikian, menurut dia, peluang untuk menembus pasar ekspor akan terbuka lebar. Apalagi, dukungan ke arah sana, termasuk dari sisi teknologi informasi, sudah sangat menunjang.***

Local Clothing Don't Be Tired of Quality Product Jacks
01 Nov 2019, 14:46 by Ai Rika Rachmawati
BANDUNG, (PR) .- Local clothing products have the potential to host the Indonesian youth market. However, some local products still have to improve quality to be able to compete with imported products that already have big names.
This was revealed by Chief Executive Officer (CEO) Nirwana Textille Group, Alex Ferdian Santoso, in Bandung, Wednesday, October 29, 2019. According to him, with the support of information technology (IT), local clothing products also have the potential to penetrate the export market.
"We have been supporting local clothing for three years. Not only raw materials, we also help finance by cooperating with fintech," said Alex.
In addition to local clothing, the company is also a supplier of raw materials for international clothing brands. Based on his observations, there are several local clothing products that are still lacking in quality.
"There are several local clothing products whose quality is lower than well-known international brands. This must be improved, we must pursue their quality," he said.
In terms of quantity, according to him, every year dozens of local clothing brands emerge with various special characteristics. In terms of enthusiasm in building a new brand, he claimed to give a thumbs up.
"His homework is just competing to improve quality so that it is aligned with well-known international brands. Local clothing is not tired of improving product quality to reach a wider market," he said.
Thus, according to him, the opportunity to penetrate the export market will be wide open. Moreover, support in that direction, including information technology, has been very supportive. ***
